trans-unit.source: Converts a <xref href="Microsoft.VisualBasic.Activities.VisualBasicSettings"></xref> instance to the specified type.
trans-unit.target: Konverterer en <xref href="Microsoft.VisualBasic.Activities.VisualBasicSettings"> </xref> forekomsten til den angitte typen.

trans-unit.source: VisualBasicSettingsConverter facilitates the deserialization of Visual Basic expressions from XAML.
trans-unit.target: VisualBasicSettingsConverter muliggjør deserialisering av Visual Basic uttrykk fra XAML.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="Microsoft.VisualBasic.Activities.XamlIntegration.VisualBasicSettingsConverter"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="Microsoft.VisualBasic.Activities.XamlIntegration.VisualBasicSettingsConverter"> </xref> klasse.

trans-unit.source: Determines whether an object of the specified type can be converted to a <xref href="Microsoft.VisualBasic.Activities.VisualBasicSettings"></xref> instance.
trans-unit.target: Bestemmer om et objekt av den angitte typen kan konverteres til en <xref href="Microsoft.VisualBasic.Activities.VisualBasicSettings"> </xref> forekomsten.

trans-unit.source: If `sourceType` is a <xref:System.String>, this method returns `true`; otherwise, the determination is made by calling the base class method <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter.CanConvertFrom%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Hvis `sourceType` er en <xref:System.String>, metoden returnerer `true`; ellers fastsettelse gjøres ved å kalle metoden basisklassen <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter.CanConvertFrom%2A>.</xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter.CanConvertFrom%2A> </xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: Context information that is used for conversion.
trans-unit.target: Informasjon om sikkerhetskontekst som brukes til konvertering.

trans-unit.source: The type to convert from.
trans-unit.target: Typen til å konvertere fra.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the specified type can be converted from; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis den angitte typen kan konverteres fra; Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Determines whether a <xref href="Microsoft.VisualBasic.Activities.VisualBasicSettings"></xref> instance can be converted into an instance of the specified type.
trans-unit.target: Bestemmer om en <xref href="Microsoft.VisualBasic.Activities.VisualBasicSettings"> </xref> forekomsten kan konverteres til en forekomst av den angitte typen.

trans-unit.source: This method returns `false` if the `destinationType` is a <xref:System.String>; otherwise, the determination is made by calling the base class method <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter.CanConvertTo%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden returnerer `false` hvis den `destinationType` er en <xref:System.String>ellers fastsettelse gjøres ved å kalle metoden basisklassen <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter.CanConvertTo%2A>.</xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter.CanConvertTo%2A> </xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: Context information that is used for conversion.
trans-unit.target: Informasjon om sikkerhetskontekst som brukes til konvertering.

trans-unit.source: The type to convert to.
trans-unit.target: Typen til å konvertere til.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if a <xref href="Microsoft.VisualBasic.Activities.VisualBasicSettings"></xref> instance can be converted to an instance of the specified type; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis en <xref href="Microsoft.VisualBasic.Activities.VisualBasicSettings"> </xref> forekomsten kan være konvertere til en forekomst av den angitte typen; ellers, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Converts the specified object to a <xref href="Microsoft.VisualBasic.Activities.VisualBasicSettings"></xref> instance.
trans-unit.target: Konverterer det angitte objektet til en <xref href="Microsoft.VisualBasic.Activities.VisualBasicSettings"> </xref> forekomsten.

trans-unit.source: The conversion is made by calling the base class method <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter.ConvertFrom%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Konverteringen gjøres ved å kalle metoden basisklassen <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter.ConvertFrom%2A>.</xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter.ConvertFrom%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the conversion cannot be made, a <xref:System.NotSupportedException> is thrown.
trans-unit.target: Hvis konverteringen ikke kan gjøres, en <xref:System.NotSupportedException>forårsakes.</xref:System.NotSupportedException>

trans-unit.source: Context information that is used for conversion.
trans-unit.target: Informasjon om sikkerhetskontekst som brukes til konvertering.

trans-unit.source: An optional <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>.
trans-unit.target: En valgfri <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>.</xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>

trans-unit.source: If not supplied, the current culture is assumed.
trans-unit.target: Hvis ikke angitt, antas gjeldende kultur.

trans-unit.source: The object to convert.
trans-unit.target: Objektet som skal konverteres.

trans-unit.source: An object that represents the converted value.
trans-unit.target: Et objekt som representerer konverterte verdien.

trans-unit.source: Converts a <xref href="Microsoft.VisualBasic.Activities.VisualBasicSettings"></xref> instance to the specified type.
trans-unit.target: Konverterer en <xref href="Microsoft.VisualBasic.Activities.VisualBasicSettings"> </xref> forekomsten til den angitte typen.

trans-unit.source: The conversion is made by calling the base class method <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter.ConvertTo%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Konverteringen gjøres ved å kalle metoden basisklassen <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter.ConvertTo%2A>.</xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter.ConvertTo%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the conversion cannot be made, a <xref:System.NotSupportedException> is thrown.
trans-unit.target: Hvis konverteringen ikke kan gjøres, en <xref:System.NotSupportedException>forårsakes.</xref:System.NotSupportedException>

trans-unit.source: Context information that is used for conversion.
trans-unit.target: Informasjon om sikkerhetskontekst som brukes til konvertering.

trans-unit.source: An optional <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>.
trans-unit.target: En valgfri <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>.</xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>

trans-unit.source: If not supplied, the current culture is assumed.
trans-unit.target: Hvis ikke angitt, antas gjeldende kultur.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="Microsoft.VisualBasic.Activities.VisualBasicSettings"></xref> instance to convert.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="Microsoft.VisualBasic.Activities.VisualBasicSettings"> </xref> forekomsten du vil konvertere.

trans-unit.source: The type to convert to.
trans-unit.target: Typen til å konvertere til.

trans-unit.source: The converted value.
trans-unit.target: Konvertere verdien.
